IntroToPP.title: Introduction to Python and Pandas
IntroToPP.embed_desc: The most important tools in a data scientist's toolkit. Join DS3 for the first workshop of the year and learn the fundamentals of Python and Pandas.

NLP.title: Natural Language Processing
NLP.embed_desc: Have you ever been curious about how auto-complete works? Maybe some of the chat bots you’ve talked with have been getting a little too smart. Join DS3 as we take a deep dive into Natural Language Processing!

Mindsets.title: Healthy Mindsets for Data Scientists
Mindsets.embed_desc: Have you ever thought about the most important soft skills that a Data Scientist can have? Oftentimes the skills career data scientists struggle with the most aren’t the ones you see in the classroom. Develop your career mindset soft skills with our seniors as we tackle common pitfalls you may see during school, internships, and your post-grad career!

LinearAlgebra.title: Linear Algebra Essentials
LinearAlgebra.embed_desc: Behind every machine learning expert is a deep understanding of linear algebra. Join two former big tech interns as they take you on a through crash course of Linear Algebra so that you can crush your next Deep Learning/ML class.

JavaScript.title: Javascript for Data Science
JavaScript.embed_desc: You’ve built the pipelines, now it’s time to deploy! Join DS3 as we take a deep dive through Javascript and learn how to leverage the tools provided in your data science career.
